actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an income tax deduction for individuals for purchases of contemporary American art.

summary.text: Revises the Internal Revenue Code to allow as a deduction from gross income an amount not to exceed $10,000 paid by an individual during the taxable year for qualified purchases of contemporary American art.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an income tax deduction for individuals for purchases of contemporary American art.
